articles.author: Eric Bradner
articles.title: Why Indiana GOP voters want their senators to defy Trump’s threats - CNN
articles.description: Republicans in the Indiana state Senate could give President Donald Trump a major political black eye this week — and the conservative voters who elected them say they don’t mind.
articles.content:

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: A fire at a popular nightclub in India's Goa state kills at least 25, officials say - NPR
articles.description: At least 25 people, including tourists, were killed in a fire at a popular nightclub in India's Goa state, the state's chief minister said Sunday.
articles.content:
NEW DELHI At least 25 people, including tourists, were killed in a fire at a popular nightclub in India's Goa state, the state's chief minister said Sunday.
